sentences.en: An acrobatic feat that made a terrific hit with the audience was the somersaulting.
sentences.cn: 大受观众欢迎的杂技表演是翻筋斗.

sentences.en: Trained dogs did somersaults on a man's shoulders.
sentences.cn: 一些受过训练的狗在一个男子的肩膀上翻筋斗。

phrases.tran_cn: 倒毛跟斗；倒筋斗跳；后空翻

trans.tran_en: If someone or something does a somersault, they turn over completely in the air

trans.tran_cn: 翻筋斗( somersault的现在分词 )
